title: Virtual Collaborative Project-Based Learning for Enhancing Vocational Language Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental communication skills in a language and understanding of job-related basic terminology
context.additional_context: A learner group requiring immediate workplace-applicable language skills as current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can communicate using work-related technical terminology with over 80% accuracy through three virtual collaborative tasks.
Learners can improve project deliverables twice or more by incorporating peer feedback and achieve 90% completion in the final output.
Learners can propose and implement four or more creative solutions for language utilization scenarios presented in weekly formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
